name: Crown Regency Hotel & Towers Cebu

reviews.text: I heard so much about this supposedly new hotel in town so I chose this among a lot of hotels in the city. First of all, it was so annoying to get access to my suite in the other building because you have to go up to the top floor of the first building then you have to cross (literally cross to the other building) then take another elevator down to the floor where my suite was located. My suite was huge but it was dusty, smelly, and unattended for quite sometime as you can see the dust all over the place - tables, lamps, chairs, windows, floors and etc! To make matters worse, the window draping were insufficient and improperly hanged, causing all the lights to come in during the day time which is my time to go to sleep! I think the bathroom was oudated and in badly need or renovation. I think the bath tub is constructed too high making guests too difficult to get into the tub. Talking about safety and accessibility! The desk staff are not pleasant and friendly except the room boys and lobby attendants. The hotel is situated in a busy area wherein you have to take a cab to go shopping and all.
reviews.title: disappointing, below average!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I arrived a 1:45 pm, the front desk said my room wasnt ready, im ok with that, so i come back at 4pm,,,they told me my room still wasnt ready and I had to wait an additional 45 minutes! I wasnt good with that. ordered room service, took another 45 minutes for delivery. I wont go back there again.
reviews.title: was not good

reviews.text: I stayed here for 5 nights and I enjoyed every minute here. It's a great location with an excellent vantage point to see the city.
reviews.title: Super Hotel

reviews.text: These are the best trained staff I have ever encountered anywhere. Extremely friendly, helpful and courteous staff. The buffet was the best I ever been to and it was free.
reviews.title: Edge Coaster & Skywalk for Adventurers, Elevators (not) for Idiots
2010 Trip
reviews.text: Free internet in the room, the room was very nice.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also had a memorable time at the gentlemans club in the penthouse.
reviews.title: un sure

reviews.text: Thanks to everyone of the staff for a great and memorable time from your Canadian friend!
reviews.title: Don't be fooled by the package given - it is not worth it.

reviews.text: Have an earlier reservation to avail some discounted rates. It is great to have a one of a kind experience to skywalk and ride the edge coaster!
reviews.title: It was a perfect moment with my family to be staying at an excellent venue

aka: Crown Regency Hotel And Towers Cebu
